column2: Store this file as Bewertung.xlsx in folder Aufgabe05! After that configure the file Bewertung.csv from the Bewertung.xlsx file and store it also in folder Aufgabe05!

column5: Please only process the green fields, they mostly contain drop down menus.
column7: In the following, do not be too critical with yourself. If you have implemented a functionality and my requirements were not so clear, your results are still O.K. especially when you have created tests which test your interpretation!!!

column5: Brown the completed criteria
How to evaluate by yourself
column7: Your Comment, why you think your solution is also correct.

column5: Did you upload something before deadline to SVN and this approximates the expected solution (not just code which solves something completely different)?

column1: Are the correct files with correct file names in the correct folders? Otherwise heavy lose of points possible!!!
column5: The folder name is Aufgabe05  and the code is in folder Aufgabe05\Code and there exists a file Aufgabe05\Fertig.txt and there exist two files Aufgabe05\Bewertung.xlsx and  Aufgabe05\Bewertung.csv.

column1: Did you only upload the necessary files to SVN?
column5: All your uploaded files are less than 100 K Bytes and you did not upload executables or object files and other unnecessary files?
column7: 2 Screenshots sind größer als 100kB aber < 150 kB

column5: How to evaluate by yourself
Did your code compile?
Did your code compile without warnings?
How to evaluate by yourself
Did all header files contain include guards with #ifndef or with #pragma once?
Did you split your code into separate files for functionality and for the tests?
Did you have at least seven different files (at least 3 header and 4 source files)?
How to evaluate by yourself
Did your code before (first exercise 5-1) contain at least two C-Arrays (arr[ 200 ]), which are now replaced by dynamic arrays (by using pointers)?
Did you replace at least two of your previous C-Arrays by pointers and are you able to dynamically extend the array size by operator new, i.e. you have successfully implemented resize?
column7: Nur ein vorheriges C-Array mit Pointern ersetzt (AtcoCommands in main und Tests). Zum sortieren etc. wurden Mengen genutzt.

column5: Did you also call delete[] for those dynamic arrays to avoid memory leaks?
Did you upload at least two screen dump files (name exercise-5-2-XX.jpg), which show the test code for the resize test for the dynamic arrays?
Do the test codes contain a call of freeMemory or something else which calls delete[] at the end of the test, i.e. we have no memory leaks?
column7: Die Resize() Funktion ruft delete[] selber auf, daher kein freeMemory o.ä. nötig

column5: Did you upload at least two images exercise5-2-ResizeXX.jpg and are your resize functions correct?

column1: they fail or they do NOT fail?
column5: Change at least one of your resize functions, so that your tests for that function crash or output a false, do NOT change the test itself. Do the tests fail or crash?
How to evaluate by yourself
Did your main function contain argc and argv?
Did you use argc and argv in your main, so that you evaluate whether main is called in test mode or in other mode?
Is the file  exercise5-3-ProgramRuns01.jpg checked into SVN folder Aufgabe05\Images?
Does exercise5-3-ProgramRuns01.jpg show the expected output, i.e. when main runs not in test mode?

column1: The following you can only evaluate, when you have finally checkin your code. Then you get the final evaluation criteria.

column5: Is the file  exercise5-3-ProgramRuns02.jpg checked in into folder Aufgabe05\Images?
Does exercise5-3-ProgramRuns02.jpg show the expected output, see work sheet "Images" in this excel file?
The file  2016-07-12__08-37-28-08 contains in the screen dump (exercise5-3-ProgramRuns02.jpg) 6 commands?

The file  2016-08-12__08-37-28-08 (the last one) contains in the screen dump (exercise5-3-ProgramRuns02.jpg) 6 commands, not seven, although the input file contains 7 commands, but we want to limit to six commands? The program should not crash.
It there a file exercise5-3-ProgramTest01.jpg in SVN?
Is the screen dump of file exercise5-3-ProgramTest01.jpg different from the output, when not called with "--test"? Does it show that all tests were successful?

Speichern Sie diese Datei im Ordner Aufgabe05 unter dem Namen
Bewertung.xlsx als Excel-Datei ab. Speichern  Sie die Datei
außerdem als csv-Datei (comma seperates values) als Bewertung.csv im gleichen Ordner ab. Beim Speichern als csv-Datei muss dieses Arbeitsblatt geöffnet sein. Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie zuvor auch die Excel-Datei selbst abgespeichert haben
